definitions.definition: Either of the two organs on the front of a female human 's chest , which contain the mammary glands ; also the analogous organs in males .
examples: Tanya’s breasts grew remarkably during pregnancy.

definitions.definition: The chest , or front of the human thorax.
A section of clothing covering the breast area.
The figurative seat of the emotions , feelings etc.; one’s heart or innermost thoughts.
examples: She kindled hope in the breast of all who heard her.

definitions.definition: The ventral portion of an animal’s thorax .
examples: The robin has a red breast .

definitions.definition: A choice cut of poultry , especially chicken or turkey , taken from the bird’s breast; also a cut of meat from other animals, breast of mutton , veal , pork .
examples: Would you like breast or wing?

definitions.definition: The front or forward part of anything.
The upper surface of a landform or body of water .
The face of a coal working.
The power of singing; a musical voice.

main_definition: ( anatomy ) Either of the two organs on the front of a female human 's chest , which contain the mammary glands ; also the analogous organs in males .
